name: Where The Heart Is (wolfybytes)
description:
The body is the home of the mind. Where The Heart Is is an atmospheric exploration within. 

This game was developed in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019 by Emerson Smith, Grey Hash, Mark Eads, and Claire Paisley.

  • Fly into green bacteria to absorb them.
  • Destroy the virus.

Controls are WASD for turning, Q and E to roll, and Space to boost. Alternate controls are available using the arrow keys, / and Right Shift to roll, and Right Ctrl or F to boost.

Credits: Programming and gameplay by Emerson Smith, 3D art and environment by Grey Hash, music by Mark Eads, and technical audio design, 2D art, and writing by Claire Paisley. 

We ran out of time to implement a ton of work done during the jam, so we've included it in the WTHI-Extras folder. Hope you enjoy that look inside the development process.
